author: pdelasalle
content:
Any talks on adding a term premium to the staking reward?
Total reward unchanged (no impact on supply) but split would be different, function of the term of the stake (e.g.: spot, 1W, 1M, 3M, 6M, 12M - similar to money market tenors) with penalties if you unstake before term.
This would 1) increase predictability of total staking and 2) is more fair for validators (today the marginal/daily reward for a long term staker vs. an opportunistic staker is the same). Another application would be to derive a layer0 Ethereum Yield Curve.
